definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: acc. to Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 108) topaz or chrysolite (acc. to LXX topa/zion, Vulgate topazius, etc.; prob. foreign word, cf. Skr. pîta (prop. yellow));—named with other precious stones Ez Eze 28:13, Ex 28:17 = Ex 39:10; cstr. [[פִּטְדַת־כּוּשׁ]] Job 28:19.—Vid. Plin:NH xxxvii. 8 (32), Houghton in Sm:DB, Topaz Ri:HWB, Edelstein.
